title: Carcassonne: a French fortress = Carcassonne, fortifications francaises
creator_credit: Ernest Kleinberg, Ernest Kleinberg Films and Oxford Films (U.S.)
brief_description: A French language teaching film. Presents a visual tour through Carcassonne, the finest example of a fortified medieval city. Shows how the past influences the lives of the townspeople and includes scenes of shops, schools and farms as well as a brief sequence of a French family. Suitable for secondary school level.
